trans-unit.source: Provides ambient property values to top-level controls.
trans-unit.target: 최상위 컨트롤에 앰비언트 속성 값을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a property on a control that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않은 경우, 즉 앰비언트 속성은 컨트롤의 속성 설정, 부모 컨트롤에서 검색 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the control does not have a parent and the property is not set, the control tries to find the value of the ambient property through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤을 통해 앰비언트 속성의 값을 확인 하려고 컨트롤에 부모 릴리스 레코드가 없습니다. 속성은는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the control is not sited, the site does not support ambient properties, or the property is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> uses its own default values.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 배치 되어 있지 않습니다, 사이트 앰비언트 속성을 지원 하지 않거나 속성이 설정 되지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> 자체 기본값을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Some objects derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class might set the property even if you do not.
trans-unit.target: 일부 개체에서 파생 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> 그렇지 않은 경우에 클래스 속성을 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class always sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> 클래스는 항상 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties" /> class.
Gets or sets the ambient background color of an object.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that represents the background color of an object.
If there is no ambient background color, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 없는 앰비언트 배경색을 값의 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> 속성이 <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient cursor of an object.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> that represents the cursor of an object.
If there is no ambient cursor, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 값을 앰비언트 커서가 없습니다 인지는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> 속성은 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient font of an object.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that represents the font used when displaying text within an object.
trans-unit.target: 개체 내에 텍스트를 표시할 때 사용되는 글꼴을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If there is no ambient font, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 값을 앰비언트 글꼴이 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> 속성은 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient foreground color of an object.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that represents the foreground color of an object.
If there is no ambient foreground color, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 앰비언트 전경 색 없음의 값이 없는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> 속성이 <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.
